summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on November 22, 2010. The email contains a request for a phone call and includes a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be attorney-client privileged.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a desire to communicate with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting a professional relationship.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is reaching out to Jes Staley for a phone call, indicating a personal or professional connection.

keyFacts: The email is marked as confidential and may contain attorney-client privileged information.
The email requests a phone call between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley.
